subject: Pensions and Retirement Plans
Football
Retirement
Athletics and Sports
lead_paragraph: An initiative begun by the Chiefs’ Kyle Turley hopes to persuade N.F.L. players to donate part of their Dec. 23 game paychecks to an organization assisting retired players in need.
snippet: An initiative begun by the Chiefs’ Kyle Turley hopes to persuade N.F.L. players to donate part of their Dec. 23 game paychecks to an organization assisting retired players in need.
